bug.author: AlexDBlack
bug.summary: Libnd4j: reduce_norm2_bp scalar case - "Not implemented yet"
bug.description: Looks like this one got missed/forgotten during the recent datatype refactoring. <denchmark-link:https://github.com/deeplearning4j/deeplearning4j/blob/af7155d61dc810d3e7139f15f98810e0255b2e17/libnd4j/include/ops/declarable/generic/parity_ops/reduce_norm2.cpp#L107-L115>https://github.com/deeplearning4j/deeplearning4j/blob/af7155d61dc810d3e7139f15f98810e0255b2e17/libnd4j/include/ops/declarable/generic/parity_ops/reduce_norm2.cpp#L107-L115</denchmark-link>

comments.comment: This thread has been automatically locked since there has not been any recent activity after it was closed. Please open a new issue for related bugs.
